description.p: A composition_of_schematic_element_occurrence is a mapped_item that is a Composition_of_schematic_element_occurrence.
A composition_of_schematic_element_definition shall not specify a scaling, translation or rotation.

where.label: schematic_element_occurrence_as_part
where.description: The part shall be a schematic_element_occurrence.

where.label: schematic_element_occurrence_as_whole
where.description: The whole shall be a schematic_element_occurrence.

description.p: A connection_of_schematic_element_occurrence is a representation_relationship that is a Connection_of_schematic_element_occurrence.
A connection_of_schematic_element_occurrence shall not specify a scaling, translation or rotation.

where.label: schematic_element_occurrence_as_side_1
where.description: The side 1 shall be a schematic_element_occurrence.

where.label: schematic_element_occurrence_as_side_2
where.description: The side 2 shall be a schematic_element_occurrence.

description.p: A definition_of_schematic_element_occurrence is a mapped_item relationship that is a Definition_of_schematic_element_occurrence.
description.note: This entity is regarded as a type of mapped_item rather than subset, for compatibility with other parts of ISO 10303.
description.p: A definition_of_schematic_element_occurrence shall not specify a scaling, rotation or transformation.

where.label: schematic_element_as_superset
where.description: the superset shall be a schematic_element.

where.label: schematic_element_occurrence_as_subset
where.description: the subset shall be a schematic_element_occurrence.

description.p: A derivation_of_schematic_element_definition is a mapped_item that is a Derivation_of_schematic_element_definition.
A derivation_of_schematic_element_definition can specify a scaling, but shall not specify a translation or rotation.

where.label: schematic_element_definition_as_base
where.description: the base shall be a schematic_element_definition.

where.label: implicit_schematic_element_definition_as_derived
where.description: the derived shall be an implicit_schematic_element_definition.

description.p: A draughting_model is a specification that can be reproduced as patches of ink on paper or pixels on a visual display screen, and that represents one or more of the following:

ul.li: the type of a product or activity;
relationships of a product or activity;
properties of a product or activity.

description.p: A draughting_model can be:

ul.li: defined by algorithm from the shape model of a product;
defined by explicit annotation text, curves and filled areas;
be an assembly of two or more other draughting models.

description.note: This entity is identitical to the entity of the same name defined within ISO 10303-201:1994

unique.label: unique_id
unique.description: The name of a draughting_model shall be unique.

where.label: valid_draughting_model_items
where.description: Each item of a draughting_model shall be a mapped_item, styled_item or axis2_placement.

where.label: valid_mapped_items
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY ( mi <* QUERY ( it <* SELF.items | ('REPRESENTATION_SCHEMA.MAPPED_ITEM' IN TYPEOF(it)) ) | (NOT (SIZEOF(['DRAUGHTING_ANNOTATION_MIM.SHAPE_REPRESENTATION', 'SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_MIM.DRAUGHTING_MODEL'] * TYPEOF(mi\mapped_item.mapping_source.mapped_representation)) = 1 )) )) = 0
where.description: If there is a mapped_item in a draughting_model, then the source of the mapped_item shall be a shape_representation or another draughting_model.

where.label: valid_use_of_style
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY ( smi <* QUERY ( si <* QUERY ( it <* SELF.items | ('DRAUGHTING_ANNOTATION_MIM.STYLED_ITEM' IN TYPEOF(it)) ) | ('REPRESENTATION_SCHEMA.MAPPED_ITEM' IN TYPEOF(si\styled_item.item)) ) | (NOT (('DRAUGHTING_ANNOTATION_MIM.SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF(smi\styled_item.item\mapped_item.mapping_source.mapped_representation)) AND (SIZEOF(QUERY ( sty <* smi\styled_item.styles | (NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY ( psa <* sty.styles | (NOT ('DRAUGHTING_ANNOTATION_MIM.CURVE_STYLE' IN TYPEOF(psa))) )) = 1 )) )) = 1))) )) = 0
where.description: If a mapped_item is styled, then the source of the mapped_item shall be a shape_representation and the style applied to the mapped_item shall be a curve_style.

entity.name: explicit_schematic_element_definition
entity.description: An explicit_schematic_element_definition is a schematic_element_definition that is a Explicit_schematic_element_definition.

where.label: not_derived_or_defined_by_assembly
where.expression: (SIZEOF( QUERY(it <* SELF.items | 'SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_MIM.' + 'DERIVATION_OF_SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF(it) ) ) = 0) AND (SIZEOF( QUERY(it <* SELF.items | 'SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_MIM.' + 'USAGE_OF_SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(it) ) ) >= 0)

description.p: The form of an explicit_schematic_element_definition shall be defined by neither a single instance of derivation_of_schematic_element_definition nor by one or more instances of usage_of_schematic_element_occurrence.
description.note: A explicit_schematic_element_definition is defined by its instances of styled_item.

entity.name: implicit_schematic_element_definition
entity.description: An implicit_schematic_element_definition is a schematic_subfigure_representation that is a Implicit_schematic_element_definition.

description.p: The form of an implicit_schematic_element_definition shall not be defined explicitly by reference to instances of styled_item.
description.note: Instead the form of an implicit_schematic_element_definition is defined as an assembly of instances of schematic_element_occurrence or by derivation from another instance of schematic_element_definition.

where.label: either_derived_once_or_defined_by_assembly
where.expression: (SIZEOF( QUERY(it <* SELF.items | 'SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_MIM.' + 'DERIVATION_OF_SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF(it) ) ) = 1) OR (SIZEOF( QUERY(it <* SELF.items | 'SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_MIM.' + 'USAGE_OF_SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(it) ) ) >= 1)
where.description: The form of an implicit_schematic_element_definition shall be defined by either a single instance of derivation_of_schematic_element_definition or by one or more instances of usage_of_schematic_element_occurrence.

entity.name: schematic_element
entity.description: A schematic_element is a draughting_model and a class that is a Schematic_element.

where.label: valid_mapping
where.expression: SIZEOF( QUERY(it <* SELF.items | ('REPRESENTATION_SCHEMA.MAPPED_ITEM' IN TYPEOF(it)) AND ('SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_MIM.DRAUGHTING_MODEL' IN TYPEOF (it\mapped_item.mapping_source.mapped_representation)) AND (NOT( SIZEOF( ['SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_MIM.' + 'DERIVATION_OF_SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_DEFINITION', 'SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_MIM.' + 'USAGE_OF_SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_OCCURRENCE', 'SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_MIM.' + 'DEFINITION_OF_SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_OCCURRENCE' ] * TYPEOF(it) ) = 1 )) ) ) = 0
where.description: If there is a mapped_item in a schematic_element that has a draughting_model as its source, then the mapped_item shall be a derivation_of_schematic_element_definition, usage_of_schematic_element_occurrence, or definition_of_schematic_element_occurrence.

description.p: A schematic_element_definition is a schematic_element that is a Schematic_element_definition.
A 'top' schematic_element_definition that corresponds to a complete drawing and is subject to configuration management shall also be a drawing_sheet_revision.
A schematic_element_occurrence is a schematic_element that is a Schematic_element_occurrence.
A schematic_element_occurrence plays a particular role within a schematic_element_definition. This role is specified by either:

The form of a schematic_element_occurrence is specified by a definition_of_schematic_element_occurrence. Two instances of definition_of_schematic_element_occurrence can be specified for a schematic_element_occurrence, where:
In this case, the form specified by the reference to a schematic_element_definition takes precidence over any form specified by reference to a schematic_element_occurrence.
A form need not specified for a schematic_element_occurrence. This is valid if:

ul.li: the schematic_element_occurrence is part of a schematic_element_definition from which other occurrences are created; and
a form is set for each of these higher order occurrences.

inverse.name: usage_in_map
inverse.description: The instances of representation_map in which the schematic_element_occurrence is referenced.

description.p: The form of a schematic_element_occurrence shall not be defined explicitly by reference to instances of styled_item.
description.note: Instead the form of a schematic_element_occurrence can be defined only by reference to a schematic_element_definition.

where.label: defined_with_respect_to_definition_no_more_than_once
where.expression: SIZEOF( QUERY(it <* SELF.usage_in_map.map_usage | ('SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_MIM.' + 'DEFINITION_OF_SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(it)) AND ('SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_MIM.' + 'SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF (it\mapped_item.mapping_source.mapped_representation) ) ) ) <= 1
where.description: The form of a schematic_element_occurrence shall not be defined by reference to more than one instance of schematic_element_definition.

where.label: referenced_as_usage_or_defined_with_respect_to_occurrence
where.expression: SIZEOF( QUERY(it <* SELF.usage_in_map.map_usage | 'SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_MIM.' + 'USAGE_OF_SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(it) ) ) + SIZEOF( QUERY(it <* SELF.usage_in_map.map_usage | ('SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_MIM.' + 'DEFINITION_OF_SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(it)) AND ('SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_MIM.' + 'SCHEMATIC_ELEMENT_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF (it\mapped_item.mapping_source.mapped_representation) ) ) ) = 1

description.p: A schematic_element_occurrence shall either:

ul.li: be referenced by a usage_of_schematic_element_occurrence which places it as part of a schematic_element_definition that is an assembly of instances of schematic_element_occurrence; or

be defined definition_of_schematic_element_occurrence that references a schematic_element_occurrence. In this case the schemaic_element_occurence also has a composition_of_schematic_element relationship with the schematic_element_occurrence of which it is a part.

description.p: A usage_of_schematic_element_occurrence is a mapped_item that is a Usage_of_schematic_element_occurrence.
A usage_of_schematic_element_occurrence can specify a translation or rotation, but shall not specify a scaling.

where.label: schematic_element_occurrence_as_part
where.description: the part shall be a schematic_element_occurrence.

where.label: implicit_schematic_element_definition_as_whole
where.description: the whole shall be an implicit_schematic_element_definition.
